channel.title: git on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Blog

item.title: Git Tips
item.description: Move last 2 commits from master to develop git checkout master git branch -d develop git log git reset --hard HEAD~2 git checkout <sha1_of_last_orphan_commit> git checkout -b develop Correct master branched to develop git checkout develop git log git reset --hard HEAD~1 git checkout master git reset --hard <sha1_orphan_merge_commit> git comit --amend // rename commit
